templates.name: Ubiquiti UniFi Controller
templates.desc: Powerful network controller for Ubiquiti UniFi network hardware. Manage your UniFi wireless access points, UniFi security appliances and even your UniFi telephony products.

templates.name: OSTicket Support Ticket System
templates.desc: Simple helpdesk system powered by OSTicket. Manage support request, troubleshooting, and keep a knowledge base of previous cases.
